Family Engagement Plan

 

Rising Star ISD

Family Engagement Plan

2018-2019

 

The family engagement plan shall create a foundation for the collaboration of families, school, and community in building relationships that support student learning and achievement, family well being, and the continuous development of children, families, and educators.

Family Engagement Plan

Mission of Washington Colony Elementary School District

Misión del Distrito Escolar Washington Colony

      Our mission, in partnership with students, parents, and community is to deliver high-quality learning experiences which promote lifelong success for all our students by providing students and parents with educational choices consistent with our core values of a commitment to learning, an atmosphere of respect, community involvement, effective communication, and accountability . . .
